amendment.description: To permit a Senator to raise a single point of order that several provisions violate Section 102.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2983 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 2983 proposed by Senator Lott for Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S2491-2493, S2509; text: CR S2492) To permit a Senator to raise a single point of order that several provisions violate Section 102.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2983 proposed by Senator Lott for Senator Ensign.
